Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.commands

Class SelectItemsCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.commands.SelectItemsCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class SelectItemsCommand extends Object implements Command
The SelectItemsCommand class represents a command for picking tiles from the game board. It contains all checker methods in order to respect all the constraints of the game rules

  • Method Details

    • selectionChecker

      public void selectionChecker() throws SelectionInvalidOrEmptySlotException, NoFreeSidesException, NotSameRowOrColException, NoConsecutiveSelectionException
      Invokes all methods that check if the coordinates chosen are valid
      Throws:
      SelectionInvalidOrEmptySlotException - when items taken from the gameBoard are from empty or invalid slots
      NoFreeSidesException - when one of the items selected has no free sides on the gameBoard
      NotSameRowOrColException - when the selected items aren't from the same row or column
      NoConsecutiveSelectionException - when the selected items aren't adjacent

    • setGameBoardView

      Parameters:
      gb - GameBoardView

      Returns:
      int -> number of tiles chosen

    • execute

      public void execute() throws SelectionInvalidOrEmptySlotException, NoFreeSidesException, NotSameRowOrColException, NoConsecutiveSelectionException, FullColumnException
      Invokes methods to ask the number of tiles, their coordinates and their order for when they're put on the shelf and to check if the choices made are valid
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Throws:
      SelectionInvalidOrEmptySlotException - when items taken from the gameBoard are from empty or invalid slots
      NoFreeSidesException - when one of the items selected has no free sides on the gameBoard
      NotSameRowOrColException - when the selected items aren't from the same row or column
      NoConsecutiveSelectionException - when the selected items aren't adjacent
      FullColumnException - when the shelf column is full
